programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: ZoonicornsIntheZooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: The lucky amulet April has bought arrives in the mail. Pai and Xia make fun of her – until they see that April is suddenly top in every discipline. First Pai and then Xia steals her amulet, and whoever has it wins at everything. They are arguing over who should keep the amulet, when Maestro Woof reveals it wasn’t the amulet April bought at all. It was a pumice stone that he had ordered. The Guardians realize that good luck doesn’t depend on outside factors but comes from inside themselves.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: Breaking Chai
programme.desc: A holy man with quite a fan following claiming to possess magical telepathic powers turns up outside the shop. Chai Raja is more than accommodating- after all its extra business right at the doorstep and Basha is curious as the flexible Baba flaunts some acrobatic twists that Basha finds interesting. Sundar, on the other hand is too lazy and not enthusiastic about the extra crowd. The Baba is pompous and demanding- he bosses Chai Raja about . Chai Raja sees the crowding eager fans and the extra money and accommodates the demands. But Sundar is irritated by the Babas attitude and would love to get rid of him. Basha on the flipside is won over by the Baba who magically pulls out special bananas for Basha- Basha instantly teams up with the Baba. Sundar annoyed further at this partnership clumsily intervenes and instead he ends up exposing the Baba who was actually an imposter all along. Though the show is ruined, Chai Raja still grins as his shop has suddenly gone all popular and people are streaming in to see the dog that dunnit and Sundar for once, though still a server, beams as he dishes out paw-shaped fritters- his way of giving an autograph.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: THE DRILL GRILL
programme.desc: Construction workers leave the plot near to the hotel leaving behind their drilling machine. In the crowded hotel while Sundar is busy serving customers a loud whining sound bothers everyone. Its Basha who has found a new innovative way to be an instigator. He drills the ground with a huge drilling machine just to grill Sundar. As expected, a mad chase ensues where Basha is coming up with hilarious ideas using the drilling machine he is drilling into the earth and popping up in the tea shop stealing stuff, he is making the entire glass almirah filled with snacks vanish right underground, he jumps on the drilling machine like a jumping jack snatching food from the customers, he even makes the customer vanish underground only to throw them back minus their food. Things go haywire with a screaming Sundar chasing him. And when at last when Sundar procures the drilling machine, he trying to switch it off makes the entire hotel collapse standing proudly right in front of Chai Raja. God save Sundar!

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: Star to Star
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Blackberry Tea
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: ATHITHI DEVO BHAVA
programme.desc: Chai Raja has taught Sundar a valuable lesson that customers are like god. Cashing on this opportunity Basha walks into the hotel pretending to be a customer. Basha comes into the shop in all kind of disguises dressed like a pot-bellied Carnatic singer soon caught by Sundar, as a suited up officer soon caught by Sundar and at last as a sadhu making Sundar do all sorts of silly and insane chores/services. At last when the customer asks Sundar to massage his limbs, Sundar finds a peculiar fifth leg (Bashas tail) which makes Sundar lose all control and he goes mad. It is sheer madness in the teashop.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: TIMBER!!
programme.desc: There is unusual rush at the tea shop as customers seem to be pouring in. Chai Raja efficiently whips up teas but they are running short of chairs. Sundar runs pillar to post to seat the customers, even though Basha is trying his best to trip him up. Sundar then has an unusual brainwave- sure that he will impress his boss, Sundar throws open the closet and pulls out some chairs that had been stacked in a while ago. Proudly he sets them up and looks over to Chai Raja for a pat on the back- but then termites march out from under the old chairs...up and down the shop, chewing the tables/chairs...Sundar runs to keep them from crashing but Basha is all for helping the termites out. He glibly channels them this way and that and Chai Raja gawks as his customers who sit on chairs end up squatting on sawdust. Chai Raja discovers that its Sundars brainwave thats responsible for this wave of pests! Its crunch time for the termites and Sundar...and he better hurry else Chai Raja will be left with handle-less pans and a pile of dust instead of furniture!

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: TRUNK CALL
programme.desc: Its a festival day and one of Chai Rajas customers has brought in a giant tusker who he parks outside the stall. But it is at the very same time that Sundar and Basha are steeped in a blind chase- a pan comes flying and knocks the customer out. As others carry him off for some first aid, Chai Raja entrusts the elephant in Sundars care. Sundar is intimidated by the animal has no choice but to accept. Inquisitive Basha meanwhile discovers that the tusker is in fact nothing but a gentle giant Basha strikes a plan to use Sundars fear of the animal to lay hands on extra banana-fries. As Sundarworks , he spots the tuskers trunk snake in and suck in banana fritters. He jumps to confront the animal but comes up nose against the pointed tusks. And so the fritters keep disappearing, until Sundar spots Basha hi-fiving the tusker. Furious, Sundar decides to teach the both of them a lesson and rigs a watery trap to drench Basha and the tusker, but the trap malfunctions and it all ends in the massive tusker, sliding behind first ramming into the stall and the tea shop board reads Hotel Cali Torn- Ia!

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: New Point of View - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: TEA N TUNE
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in form splashing and whipping his frothy tea wowing his customers when suddenly the radio goes bust. Chai Raja freezes, his creative- tea affected and try as hard as he can, he can barely hold up a can- forget all the acrobatics he was normally capable of. Sundar tries his best (rigs up music with utensils, hashed-up instruments etc) to restart Chai Raja but except for the assault on ears, there is little effect on Chai Raja who stays slumped, dazed. Customers are thinning. And Basha is getting desperate since his only source of yummy food is Chai Raja. For once Sundar and Basha decide to team up together. They try to bring into the hotel all sorts of silly wacky instruments, and all kinds of musicians (from carnatics to Hindustani to pop to rastafarians) and even some crazy loud speakers to cheer up Chai Raja. But nothing! The squabble escalates till there is outright mayhem that ends in Sundar and Basha crashing into the radio. It starts playing again and Chai Raja, zaps to his skilful self and gets to chai-juggling again. Customers pop back in again and Sundar is happy, until he finds Basha gobbling food and dashes to chase him off.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Pencil
programme.desc: After scribbling away lets come up with some fun DIY ideas

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: Broken Umbrella
programme.desc: Giving umbrellas a second life with these fascinating ideas

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Tarot Tales
programme.desc: A fake yogi loses his forecasting parrot and is in search for a replacement. As he passes by GrandPA’s house he sees Keet and wants him as his fortune telling parrot.

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: Burping Boulders
programme.desc: Afraid of the loud thunder in the waking world, Maple discovers in the Zooniverse that Ene fears something too - the mysterious and loud burping boulders. Together they go on a journey to face their fears - and find fun along the way. With persistence you can overcome your fears… and sharing your feelings is the start of a solution

programme.title: Fussy eater
programme.desc: The twins meet a mother dromedary and her child - they have a long trip across the desert ahead of them but the baby is too fussy an eater to have a healthy lunch.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Afternoon Off
programme.desc: To prove to Brains he can go one day without Friday, Fred agrees to a day without him, picking a day he ends up desperately needing him.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: Castle Down
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs dig tunnels underneath the Castle that bring it crashing down underground. Melody and Nardy must face their fears and work together to bring the Castle back up to Smightyland.

programme.title: The Princess's Party
programme.desc: Aladdin and Jamillah really want to go to the big party that the Princess is holding in the palace gardens but they dont even have an invitation, let alone anything to wear. Genie is convinced he can sneak them in, so he conjures up some great party threads but warns them that they will only last until sunset and they must be back before then or the clothes will disappear! The party is great fun until Aladdin gets carried away pretending to be visiting royalty and forgets the deadline leaving them exposed to the anger of the Grand Vizier. They try to make a run for it but he catches them and its only Genie swooping in at the last minute that saves them.

programme.title: The Missing Sliper_Based On Cinderella
programme.desc: In the story of Cinderella, our heroine flees the ball at the stroke of twelve, leaving behind one of her glass slippers. This, the Prince keeps in his bedroom until he can begin the search for the woman he intends to marry. But, the next day, when the Royal Secretary appears before the Prince, ready to begin his work, he discovers that the precious slipper has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: The Secret Book – Sleeping Beauty Case 2
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant, Fo, travel into the story of “The Sleeping Beauty”, having been called out by the three good fairies. The Prince has been turned to stone by a mysterious spell, just when he was about to reach the castle, where he would kiss her, thus waking her up. The three fairies have tried to break the spell with their magic wands, but to no avail. Sandra will soon discover that the culprit is the Evil Fairy, who gets her spells from a secret book. Only if they can get hold of that book will the three fairies be able to bring the Prince back to life. Plucking up all their courage, Sandra and Fo will enter the evil fairy’s sinister castle in search of the mysterious secret book.

programme.title: The Cup Final – Snow Queen
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SNOW QUEEN, by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by GERDA, a young girl, whose best friend, KAY, has been whisked off by a white sleigh, driven by an enigmatic woman dressed in white furs. She is the SNOW QUEEN, who has taken KAY to her palace at the North Pole. After a kiss from the SNOW QUEEN, the boy has lost all his memories and is now a prisoner in the palace of ice. SANDRA and FO will have to find him and rescue him from the powerful Lady of Winter.

programme.title: King Of Mortadela - Pinocchio Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA, fairytale detective, and her assistant, FO, travel into the tale of PINOCCHIO. He, who is now a real, flesh-and-blood boy, has inexplicably grown donkeys ears. At the same time, his father, GEPPETTO, has received an anonymous letter demanding a million liras, otherwise his son will be completely transformed into a donkey. SANDRA and FO investigate and discover that HONEST JOHN and his sidekick GIDEON, two villains from the classic tale, have stolen the BLUE FAIRYs magic wand and is turning the other characters in the story into donkeys.

programme.title: Imagine Dragons
programme.desc: Maple learns the power of imagination when she imagines a dragon in the Zooniverse, and it goes out-of-control!. Learn to think things through.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: Coach Dad
programme.desc: Fred’s Dad wants to spend more time with him. He becomes the new gym coach at school. Unfortunately, he is so tough on the kids Fred has to use Friday to make fake notes from their parents, until Fred and Brains are the only ones left doing the tough workout.

programme.title: The Shape Shifter and the Magic Carpet
programme.desc: Jamillah and Aladdin go to market to buy a carpet so Genie can make it fly. They dont have enough money to buy one so Jamillah is delighted when an old lady offers to give her one, seemingly for free. What she doesnt know is that the old lady is actually the nasty Shape Shifter who can morph into any shape and shes after the lamp. She comes to Aladdins house and takes the lamp as payment for the rug and Aladdin and Jamillah have to use their wits to get it, and Genie back!

programme.title: Biggerish
programme.desc: Maple is tired of being small, but when she eats the fruit of the Biggle Tree in atop Zoonihorn Mountain, she grows so big, she becomes a destructive giant!. Be careful what you wish for; persevere, no matter what the problem.

programme.title: The Outlawed Cat - Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant FO travel into the tale of PUSS IN BOOTS, having been called by the cat. His master, the MARQUIS OF CARABAS, is about to be judged for the theft of a valuable necklace belonging to his fiancée, the PRINCESS. SANDRA and FO must find the necklace and discover the real culprit before the trial ends.

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: Friday Gets Recalled
programme.desc: Brains is informed that Friday is being recalled, and replaced by a superior shape-shifting robot weapon. Fred convinces Brains to help retrieve Friday from a futuristic junk yard, because Friday is also a friend. Meanwhile the new robot tries to hunt them down and stop them.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Hermanas por herencia
programme.desc: Aparece una mujer afirmando que Sergio tiene otra hija, él muere dejándole toda su herencia a su nueva hija.

programme.title: Hermanas por herencia
programme.desc: Aparece una mujer afirmando que Sergio tiene otra hija, él muere dejándole toda su herencia a su nueva hija.

programme.title: La cura del amor
programme.desc: El doctor Ermolov es acusado de un asesinato involutario a uno de sus pacientes y debido a esto su vida se desmorona.

programme.title: La cura del amor
programme.desc: Armolov comienza a conocer a los habitantes del pueblo donde se encuentra y de cierta forma a socializar con ellos.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Incredible Tales 8
programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: popeye's 20th anniversary (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films at a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', 'Bing Crosby', 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, Popeye instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto

programme.title: Campus Capers 1949
programme.desc: This one features a cat-versus-mouse football game between two cat-and-mouse colleges, called Harbard and Quinceton, and there is nothing Ivy-League about either school. The highlights are a screwy college fight-song and a statute-of-liberty misdirection football play in which the Statute of Liberty participates.

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: Felix Doubles for Darwin- 1924
programme.desc: A famished Felix reads an advertisement telling of a large reward for anyone that can give proof for the theory of evolution. He hurries to South Africa via Transatlantic Cable and interacts with the local animals. He angers a troop of monkeys by telling them why he's there (they're offended he would suggest they could be related to humans) and they chase him back through the cable to America

programme.title: Alice's Wonderland-1923
programme.desc: Alice visits an animation studio, where the animators show her various scenes on their drawing boards. A few of them: a cat dancing to a cat band; a mouse poking at a (live) cat until it moves; a couple mice boxing, while the animators crowd around cheering and acting as corner-men. That night, she dreams of taking a train to cartoon-land, where a red carpet reception awaits. She appears in live action. They have a welcoming parade, with Alice riding on an elephant. The cartoons dance for her, and she dances for them. Meanwhile, the lions break out of the zoo. The lions chase her into a hollow tree, then into a cave and down a rabbit hole. Finally, she jumps off a cliff and awakes back in her bed

programme.title: Sanitarium
programme.desc: Dylan goes with Mike to record his last bet, but instead they discover a twisted murderer. Their night becomes a living nightmare.

programme.title: El Nuevo Narcotraficante
programme.desc: Octavio Beltrán rose out of poverty thanks to drug dealing. Obsessed with being the best, he defies his former boss, El Sultan, and takes over the complete business. But his new worst enemy is ready to fight back and use every tool possible to get back to the top of the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Back To The Beginning
programme.desc: Erick Montalvo is released from prison and finds himself trapped in a world where everything conspires to take it back to his life as a mob enforcer, the same criminal job that drove him to a correctional in the first place.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Tucked away on 22 St at the heart of Ybor City, The Cabrera family opened a boutique Cigar shop in 2014. Ten years later, owner Vladimir Cabrera reflects on his personal journey and family business while showcasing a vast selection of premium cigars from around the world. Tune in to discover why Tampero Cigars is a straight cut above the rest!

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: On this episode of Cigar City Unrolled, owner of Long Ash Cigars - Mike- shows off his shop in the heart of Ybor city. Including his very own hand rolling station and aging room! Join us as we explore this unique style for a cigar lounge!

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar connoisseur John Callery to review the Perdomo cigar. Together, they explore its well-rounded flavors, consistent burn, and overall smoking experience, sharing their expert opinions on what makes this cigar a standout choice for enthusiasts.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Chris Kelly to review the Rocky Patel Disciple cigar. Together, they explore its bold flavors, impeccable construction, and smooth burn, offering their insights on what makes this cigar a must-try for aficionados.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Kyle Lenz to review the Ashton cigar. They dive into its smooth, refined flavors, flawless construction, and overall smoking experience, sharing their thoughts on what makes Ashton a staple in the world of cigars.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: A beloved local institution steeped in tradition. Known for its hand-rolled cigars and authentic Cuban heritage, La Faraona offers a unique glimpse into the craft of cigar making. The episode dives into the shop‚Äôs history, its role in the Ybor community.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss and cigar expert Chris Kelly review the H. Upmann Banker Daytrader cigar, examining its complex flavors, smooth draw, and impressive craftsmanship as a standout in the Banker line.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean welcomes Michael Denys from the renowned Plasencia Cigars. Join them as they delve into the rich history and innovative spirit of the Plasencia family, exploring their diverse tobacco farms and the meticulous blending process that defines their acclaimed cigars. Get an insider's perspective on what makes Plasencia a true titan in the industry.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of "Behind the Blend," Sean Mobley interviews Brian and George from Cavalier Cigars, who discuss their roles within the company, with Brian as a partner in the Honduran factory (FBT) and George as the sales representative for Florida and Puerto Rico. Brian shares his recent full-time move to Honduras, highlighting the country's beauty and the factory's unique practice of hand-applying gold leaf to cigars, a process where empowered employees can reject imperfect products. They delve into Cavalier's new "pig" size cigars in White, Black, and Viso Jalapa series, emphasizing their commitment to featuring specific wrapper leaves and promoting the "lifestyle experience" of cigars over mere consumption, with Brian concluding that cigars are his "happy place" for relaxation and rebooting.

programme.title: Guest Shaun T
programme.desc: Shaun T is an amazing fitness trainer — the man behind Insanity — and he’s had a fascinating life. He goes deep into how he was sexually abused throughout his youth and how he’s become an inspiration to others and what you really should be doing to get the best workout you can.

programme.title: Guests Tasia Simpson, Wendy Lee Turner, and Charlie Mac
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Tasia Simpson, Wendy Lee Turner, and Charlie Mac who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: September 2, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for September 2, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Babyface
programme.desc: Babyface is a legend. Songwriter, producer, singer — he’s made lots of the greatest songs of the past few decades. We talk about music — how this obsession started, how he makes it, and a deep look into some of the songs he’s made.

programme.title: Kale Krew - Kale My Name
programme.desc: Kale My Name is the multiple award-winning Chicago vegan restaurant owned by the star of Kale Krew!

programme.title: Climax Foods - Short Films
programme.desc: This cutting-edge company uses AI to make vegan cheese that is indistinguishable from dairy cheese.

programme.title: Kale Krew - Tabitha Brown - It's Your Business
programme.desc: Superstar Tabitha Brown & actor Nic Few get cooking in the kitchen of Kale My Name!

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Let's Eat in Salt Lake City
programme.desc: You wouldn't think Salt Lake City was a dining mecca but you'd be surprised! Check it out.

programme.title: Plant Based in the Burbs - Fried Shroom"Chick-Un"
programme.desc: Shroom it and get a "chick-un" dish that tastes like your favorite crispy, fried chicken.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Soft Serve: Vegan Style
programme.desc: Yoga-Urt makes the most heavenly soft serve, vegan ice cream. Let's show you how!

programme.title: Forks Over Knives
programme.desc: Can a plant-based diet reverse chronic diseases? Forks Over Knives puts food as medicine to the test

programme.title: Plant Pure Nation
programme.desc: The documentary that could save your life! Watch the documentary PlantPure Nation for FREE!

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A supernatural stalker pursues a super model to steal her soul with his demonic camera...

programme.title: The Mermaid's Curse
programme.desc: A young man falls in love with a seductive, sultry, young woman he meets on the beach. The more he falls for her, the more he will learn the dangers of falling in love with a siren...

programme.title: Ditch Day
programme.desc: Jenny Bilson, a high school senior, is the perfect student, a wonderful daughter to a veteran police detective and an all American Dream. But the one mistake she is unaware of making is about to haunt her in a very violent way, as her past returns for revenge...

programme.title: Recuérdame
programme.desc: Rose despierta en una casa desconocida tras un grave accidente de coche, con pérdida de memoria y sin poder caminar. Su madre y su novio están allí para ayudarla. Rose quiere reconstruir su vida antes del accidente. No todo es lo que parece...

programme.title: La Maldición de la Sirena
programme.desc: Un joven se enamora de una joven seductora y sensual que conoce en la playa. Cuanto más se enamora de ella, más aprende los peligros de enamorarse de una sirena...

programme.title: Aldea del Vampiro
programme.desc: Rebecca busca a su hermana, una joven periodista desaparecida mientras investigaba una serie de desafortunados sucesos. El rastro la conduce a Timere, un lugar remoto alejado del ajetreo de la vida cotidiana, donde entre el hermético silencio de los habitantes del pueblo crece el temor a que actúen fuerzas oscuras y nadie se atreve a salir de casa por la noche. Aquí Rebecca conoce a un extravagante escritor, al guardián de la iglesia del pueblo y, sobre todo, a Caleb, un hombre encantador, rico y elegante cuya oscura mirada esconde un escalofriante secreto. Es en este pueblo, donde el tiempo parece moverse entre las sombras y el peligro acecha en cada esquina, donde Rebecca se entera de la terrible verdad y comienza la batalla entre el bien y el mal...

programme.title: Cigarrito Bañado
programme.desc: Lucio huye de una deuda y un amigo peligroso. En su andar encuentra a Ximena, una bella mujer que seduce a los hombres más poderosos para después robarles su dinero. Ambos se unen para dar un gran golpe. Gran Película basada en el corrido de "El Komander"

programme.title: Cabrón y Vago
programme.desc: En esta película completa de narcos, te presentamos la historia de un hombre que se ve obligado a huir de su pueblo para salvar su vida. Pero a partir de este momento no esta dispuesto a dejarse de nadie y buscara obtener el poder necesario para regresar y cobrar su venganza.

programme.title: Apuesta con la Muerte 2
programme.desc: Tras la captura de Carrillo y de su padre, Rogelio y Emilio asumen el mando del cartel. Ahora Carrillo recobró su libertad y quiere retomar el control. En busca del poder absoluto, se desatará una guerra sin cuartel que no respetará ningún límite.

programme.title: Ámbar "El Color de la Familia Perfecta"
programme.desc: Paúl, actor y cantante, propietario de un bar musical, regresa de Canadá para luchar el régimen de visitas a fin de ver crecer a su hijo, Amanda, lo ha alejado por más de 7 años, luego de que ésta lo descubriese con otro hombre en su propia casa…

programme.title: Anabel
programme.desc: Tras la marcha, en circunstancias algo turbias, de Anabel, sus dos compañeras de piso deben buscar a alguien más con quien compartir el alquiler. El elegido es un señor mayor que logra ganarse su confianza, pero que pronto se descubrirá como una presencia extraña e inquietante.

programme.title: Amar
programme.desc: Carlos quiere pero Susana no. Joel no quiere pero Patricia lo obliga. Gabriel lo espera pero Martha no se lo da. Amado lo busca con una gringa y lo pierde. Benito lo tiene toda la vida. Concha se lo lleva más allá del sistema solar. Todos lo quieren y todos lo dan pero unos no lo reciben y otros quieren más. Así es Amar.

programme.title: Allá y Entonces
programme.desc: Narra el encuentro de Temístocles con su padrino, a quien cree haber matado y ahora supone un fantasma que viene a desquiciarlo. Pasando del drama a la comedia y enredos absurdos, Temístocles enfrenta sus fantasmas hasta perder el control de su vida y llevar su economía a la bancarrota. Su esposa va a dar a luz. Al descubrir que su padrino vive, se abre la posibilidad de saldar su deuda y romper con el maleficio.

programme.title: Expediente 53
programme.desc: Esta es una historia de misterio y acción en la ciudad de Bryan Texas el comandante Gatel pide la ayuda del FBI ya que hay muchos desaparecidos, y asesinatos en la ciudad. Los agentes Gutiérrez, Bracho y Miravalle del FBI le comentan al comandante Gatel que ellos sospechan que puede ser obra de una secta satánica y que el líder es un demonio de nombre Abal que está en el cuerpo de una bella mujer de nombre Lilly.

programme.title: 72 Horas Para Morir
programme.desc: Su madre lo dejo en manos de su padre siendo un niño y el lo preparo para ser un gatillero y hacerse cargo del territorio de Texas, por eso lo apodan el Texano. Un día en la calle se encuentra con una mujer y ella le adivina su futuro, le dice que tiene 72 horas para morir... el texano no lo cree pero algo muy malo esta por suceder.

programme.title: Vigilia
programme.desc: Santiago amanece desnudo y golpeado en medio del desierto. El joven se incorpora muy aturdido y retorna a su casa paterna. En el campo, su familia está padeciendo una gran sequía. Su padre Ernesto, lo recibe a punta de pistola mientras que su perro Arón lo protege imponiéndose amenazante contra su padre. Ernesto decide, en contra de la voluntad de su hijo, sacrificar al perro familiar que se ha vuelto cimarrón. Arón, el perro sacrificado, emerge de su tumba y sus fantasmagóricas apariciones amenazan la cordura de Ernesto y sacuden los cimientos de la familia, que queda a merced de sus impulsos salvajes.

programme.title: My Future is My Focus
programme.desc: They tried to harm you, but God… In “My Future Is My Focus,” we learn to stop fixating on our past hurts, and instead, focus on how God can work them into the future He has for us.

programme.title: It Will Come Together
programme.desc: In “It Will Come Together,” we’re shown that, no matter what we’re going through, God can bring it together for good.

programme.title: The One Who Seeks... Finds!
programme.desc: In “The One Who Seeks… Finds!” we’re reminded that during difficult seasons, we can either look for reasons to grumble or reasons to hope.

programme.title: Blown Away
programme.desc: In “Blown Away!” we learn to let go of what’s been holding us back, so we can step into what God’s been preparing for us all along.
